result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Steven C Garner

defendant.name: Garner, Steven C

records.addlTxt:
11:05 AM case called. Judge John Manydeeds for Branch 3 intake. Prosecuting Attorney Tiffany M. Winter in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Steven C Garner appeared by video, in custody from LaCrosse County Jail without counsel.

Court orders warrant quashed and bond to continue.

Settlement Conference (by phone) with District Attorney's Office (715-839-4828) on 11/21/2022 at 2:30 PM
Hearing scheduled for December 15, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Case called at 9:56 AM.
Defendant Steven C Garner not in court.  Attorney Roger M Hillestad in court for Steven C Garner.  Prosecuting Attorney Tiffany M. Winter in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Attorney Hillestad has no information for the Court as to the Defendant's non-appearance and notes that he has not had contact with him.
State requests warrant. Warrant ordered.

ADDRESS INFO for Steven C Garner
Current: 200 Oak Street, Juneau County Jail, Mauston, WI 53948 United States  (Effective: 09-08-2022)
Prior: 721 Oxford Ave, Ste 1001, DHS, Eau Claire, WI 54703 United States
from Defendant to Court requesting to appear by video if still in custody in La Crosse for the hearing in this case

Conditions:
No contact with anyone involved in illegal drug activities, except in a therapeutic setting.
Defendant to maintain absolute sobriety.
Comply with Pre-Trial Monitoring Services with possible testing based on monitoring level.

(11:25 AM case called.) Prosecuting attorney Matthew Z Kirkpatrick in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Steven C Garner appeared by video, in custody in the Eau Claire County Jail. Attorney Sonia L Anderson appeared by video for Steven C Garner. 
Defendant acknowledges receipt of the complaint and waives time limits for preliminary hearing.
Defendant is eligible for Public Defender representation.
Defendant updates address with the Court.
Settlement Conference (by phone) with District Attorney's Office (715-839-4828) on August 29, 2022 at 2:45 pm.
Hearing scheduled for September 19, 2022 at 09:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Steven C Garner
Current: 721 Oxford Ave, Ste 1001, DHS, Eau Claire, WI 54703 United States  (Effective: 08-09-2022)
Prior: Homeless, Eau Claire, WI 54701

Conditions:
No contact with anyone involved in illegal drug activities, except in a therapeutic setting.
Defendant to maintain absolute sobriety.
Comply with Pre-Trial Monitoring Services with possible testing based on monitoring level.
